#### `docs/binary_tree.md`

```markdown
# Binary Tree
```
A binary search tree (BST) implementation in Python.

## Features

- Insert
- Delete
- Search
- In-order Traversal
- Pre-order Traversal
- Post-order Traversal
- Level-order Traversal

## Class Overview

```python
class BinaryTree:
    def __init__(self):
        self.root = None
    ...
```
